subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くつ}}
* The pitch accent is derived from the entire compound word.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 2
Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|糸%口|いと%ぐち}}: the [[end]] of a [[spool]] or [[ball]] of [[thread]]
* {{ja-r|入%口|いり%ぐち}}: [[entrance]]
* {{ja-r|奥%口|おく%ぐち}}: the [[inner]] [[door]]s of a [[house]]
* {{ja-r|表%口|おもて%ぐち}}: the [[front]] [[entrance]]/[[exit]]
* {{ja-r|出%口|で%ぐち}}: [[exit]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|く}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|-}} {{ltc-l|口}}. The {{l|ja|呉音|goon}}, so likely the initial borrowing.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|く}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=く|Buddhism}} the [[mouth]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=く|Buddhism}} {{qualifier|by extension}} one's [[speech]], one's [[word]]s
# the [[mouthpiece]] of a [[flute]]

subSections.title: Counter
Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|こう}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|-}} {{ltc-l|口}}. The {{l|ja|漢音|kan'on}}, so likely a later borrowing.
